00030 namespace Hypertable {
00031 
00032   class FileBlockCache {
00033 
00034     typedef struct {
00035       int      fileId;
00036       uint32_t offset;
00037     } CacheKeyT;
00038 
00039     typedef struct cache_value {
00040       CacheKeyT  key;
00041       struct cache_value *prev;
00042       struct cache_value *next;
00043       uint8_t  *block;
00044       uint32_t length;
00045       uint32_t refCount;
00046     } CacheValueT;
00047 
00048     static atomic_t ms_next_file_id;
00049 
00050   public:
00051 
00052     FileBlockCache(uint64_t maxMemory) : m_mutex(), m_block_map(), m_head(0), m_tail(0) { return; }
00053     ~FileBlockCache();
00054     bool checkout(int fileId, uint32_t offset, uint8_t **blockp, uint32_t *lengthp);
00055     void checkin(int fileId, uint32_t offset);
00056     bool insert_and_checkout(int fileId, uint32_t offset, uint8_t *block, uint32_t length);
00057 
00058     static int get_next_file_id() {
00059       return atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_file_id);
00060     }
00061 
00062   private:
00063 
00064     void move_to_head(CacheValueT *cacheValue);
00065 
00066     struct hashCacheKey {
00067       size_t operator()( const CacheKeyT &key ) const {
00068         return key.fileId ^ key.offset;
00069       }
00070     };
00071 
00072     struct eqCacheKey {
00073       bool operator()(const CacheKeyT &k1, const CacheKeyT &k2) const {
00074         return k1.fileId == k2.fileId && k1.offset == k2.offset;
00075       }
00076     };
00077 
00078     typedef hash_map<CacheKeyT, CacheValueT *, hashCacheKey, eqCacheKey> BlockMapT;
00079 
00080     boost::mutex  m_mutex;
00081     BlockMapT     m_block_map;
00082     CacheValueT  *m_head;
00083     CacheValueT  *m_tail;
00084   };

00086 }
